item.title: [foundings] break out a loop
item.dc:creator: @wicked_destiny wicked destiny
item.description:
@wicked_destiny wrote:

i found this on the internet i dont take any creds but since i asked 18 times if someone could tell me it and noone could i found it muself and im sharing it with you now
change it to rs tekts this is just plane java

[code]class BreakDemo {
public static void main(String[] args) {

    int[] arrayOfInts = { 32, 87, 3, 589, 12, 1076,
                          2000, 8, 622, 127 };
    int searchfor = 12;

    int i;
    boolean foundIt = false;

    for (i = 0; i < arrayOfInts.length; i++) {
        if (arrayOfInts[i] == searchfor) {
            foundIt = true;
            break;
        }
    }

    if (foundIt) {
        System.out.println("Found " + searchfor
                           + " at index " + i);
    } else {
        System.out.println(searchfor
                           + " not in the array");
    }
}

}[/code]

like this

boolean foundIt = false;

  for (i = 0; i < EnteredAmount; i++) {

setAnimation(881);
RemoveAllWindows();
if(playerHasItemAmount(1511, 1)==false) {
            outoflogs = true;
            break;
        }
    }

    if (outoflogs) {
        sendMessage("you dont got enof logss to make this item.");
    } else {
        sendMessage("you made a " + GetItemName + "");
    }
}

}[/code]
